name: Downtown Jam
description:
In Downtown Jam, pull off a selection of stylish tricks and grinds to make yourself a nuisance to the corporate overlords running your city. From the chilled-out tutorial zone, into the cities center and then out into the dark, industrial Old Town.



Revolt against Dr. Taste’s evil soda corporation by shredding the streets on your skateboard! Kickflip, grind and wall-ride your way downtown and beat your friends on the leaderboard!



• Customize your cool cat with different Skateboards, outfits and character skins.
• 3 levels of non-stop tricking and grinding.
• A simplified control scheme throwing back to the Skateboarding games of yore.
• Try and reach the highest score on our global in-game leaderboard.

This game was created by nine university students studying Games Development at the University of Gloucestershire.
